scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-uibase && gulp && npm run build-umd &&  npm run build-min
scripts.build-cjs: rimraf base && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel ./src -d base --ignore '__tests__'
scripts.build-uibase: rimraf framework && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel ./fwsrc -d framework --ignore '__tests__'
scripts.build-umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ENV=development webpack index.js dist/yxbaseui.js
scripts.build-min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ENV=production webpack -p index.js dist/yxbaseui.min.js
